item.description:
This restaurant is **GREAT** for informal meetings to chat & brainstorm how best to serve members of our group ... with no background music, listening and talking are both easier. Also, we can meet jointly with the Vegetarian Meetup that lunches here at this same time if other declutterers don't show up (I'm learning that some other vegetarians besides me have clutter issues) ... Come join us- and meet some new, very interesting people!

Â 

(Note: The restaurant is up a flight of stairs, so if this factor is problematic for you, please advise ... we always welcome suggestions of alternative venues!)
item.how_to_find_us: Second floor- I'll try to always put a Meetup sign on the door and at our table

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Brainfood for Brainstorming
